title: Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia
content:
be the following:

She's all yours Never.

Make a decision to complete the quest. This will also affect your progress for the Daughter of Darkness.

How to unlock Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia

This quest is activated at the House of Grief when you encounter Viconia.

Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia Rewards

Surrender Shadowheart to Viconia Notes & Tips

Notes & tips go here

All Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik ♦ Aid the Underduke ♦ Ask the Goblin Priestess for Hel
